title: Curvv effect: After Rs 1.2 lakh price cut, Tata Motors hikes discount on Nexon.ev again
description: Tata Motors has raised discounts on its Nexon.ev by up to ₹60,000 to boost slow sales. This comes after a ₹1.2 lakh price cut. The company's electric vehicle sales have been declining, with the Nexon.ev's sales particularly affected. The newly launched Curvv.ev may also affect Nexon.ev sales due to overlapping prices.
